attributes.action: complete overhaul of entire domestic fuel situation re: charges of gas & electricity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: simply, there should be no such  situation where one group controls the rights a human being has to keep himself & his home warm & to cook & feed himself & his family. Enabling the capitalization off humanities fundamental needs & maintaining the situation & preventing the possibility of an alternative way to survive.  The fact that the term 'fuel poverty' exists, let alone is used, affirms the problem. The dichotomy of a single person receiving a government benefit of £90p/wk & having to pay £60p/wk to use gas & electricity. More than 60% of a wkly income. Thats someone on £1000p/wk paying £600p/wk for heat & to eat. Making a business from such exploitation is wrong & amounts to legalized theft. Fuel charges should be radically reduced to minimum or standardized amounts for all. Non payment of fuel charges equals legal prosecution & no fuel for the consumer, yet suppliers actions are permissible & encouraged. I urge the Prime Minister to take the matter seriously & initiate change & Government to act in implementing a fair, just system, economically sustainable & socially moral. & the public to take a stand & effect this change.
